name: One to one Tutoring
description: One-to-one instruction describes a student learning from and interacting with a teacher individually, with instruction tailored to the student's own personal pace and learning needs

name: Personalized Homeword Support
description: Are you tired of not achieving higher grades, or is the urgent deadline causing you stress? If these make you worried, then I can help you

name: Concept Clearing on Specific topics
description: While studing , you are most likely to have so many confusion about some topics . We can help you understand the topics cleary . I can help you do that as fast as possible.

name: One-on-one Mentorship support
description: Studing can be frustring sometimes . But with smart technique and right path , you can enjoy your studies and be productive as well . I can guide you with yours studies

name: Test Preparation with Demo Q/A
description: Studing is not enough . You must try solving some questions from previous year to make yourself ready for your real test exam . Let me help you prepare yourself .

name: Final Admission preparation with model test
description: Admission test is always a surprice for us . you have to be preapared in many ways . The more you practice the more you learn and be confident . Let give the 'model-tests' a go with me for a better result in addmission test
